GR13saulahpu:0: śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ na ced evaṃ devo na khalu kuśalaḥ spanditum api /
GR13saulahpu:1_0: atas tvām ārādhyāṃ hariharavirañcyādibhir api praṇantuṃ stotuṃ vā katham akṛtapuṇyaḥ prabhavati tanīyāṃsaṃ pāṃsuṃ tava caraṇapaṅkeruhabhavaṃ
GR13saulahpu:2_0: vahaty enaṃ śauriḥ katham api sahasreṇa śirasāṃ haraḥ saṃkṣubhyainaṃ bhajati bhasitoddhūlanavidhim avidyānām antastimiramihiradvīpanagarī
GR13saulahpu:3: daridrāṇāṃ cintāmaṇiguṇanikā janmajaladhau nimagnānāṃ daṃṣṭrā muraripuvarāhasya bhavatī // Saul_3 //
GR13saulahpu:4: tvadanyaḥ pāṇibhyām abhayavarado daivatagaṇas tvam ekā naivāsi prakaṭitavarābhītyabhinayā
GR13saulahpu:5_0: bhayāt trātuṃ dātuṃ phalam api ca vāñchāsamadhikaṃ śaraṇye lokānāṃ tava hi caraṇāv eva nipuṇau haris tvām ārādhya praṇatajanasaubhāgyajananīṃ
GR13saulahpu:5_1: purā nārī bhūtvā puraripum api kṣobham anayat
GR13saulahpu:6_0: smaro 'pi tvāṃ natvā ratinayanalehyena vapuṣā munīnām apy antaḥ prabhavati hi mohāya mahatām dhanuḥ pauṣpaṃ maurvī madhukaramayī
GR13saulahpu:7_0: tathāpy ekaḥ sarvaṃ himagirisute kām api kṛpāṃ apāṅgāt te labdhvā jagad idam anaṅgo vijayate kvaṇatkāñcīdāmā karikalabhakumbhastanabharā
GR13saulahpu:8: dhanur bāṇān pāśaṃ sṛṇim api dadhānā karatalaiḥ purastād āstāṃ naḥ puramathitur āhopuruṣikā sudhāsindhor madhye suraviṭapivāṭīparivṛte maṇidvīpe nīpopavanavati cintāmaṇigṛhe /
GR13saulahpu:9: śivākāre mañce paramaśivaparyaṅkanilayāṃ bhajanti tvāṃ dhanyāḥ kati cana cidānandalaharīm mahīṃ mūlādhāre kam api maṇipūre hutavahaṃ sthitaṃ svādhiṣṭhāne hṛdi marutam ākāśam upari
GR13saulahpu:10_0: mano 'pi bhrūmadhye sakalam api bhittvā kulapathaṃ sahasrāre padme saha rahasi patyā viharasi sudhādhārāsāraiś caraṇayugalāntarvigalitaiḥ
GR13saulahpu:11_0: avāpya svāṃ bhūmiṃ bhujaganibham adhyuṣṭavalayaṃ svam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā svapiṣi kulakuṇḍe kuhariṇi caturbhiḥ śrīkaṇṭhaiḥ śivayuvatibhiḥ
GR13saulahpu:11_1: pañcabhir api prabhinnābhiḥ śaṃbhor navabhir iti mūlaprakṛtibhiḥ
GR13saulahpu:13: trirekhābhiḥ sārdhaṃ tava caraṇakoṇāḥ pariṇatāḥ // Saul_11 //
GR13saulahpu:14: tvadīyaṃ saundaryaṃ tuhinagirikanye tulayituṃ kavīndrāḥ kalpante katham api viriñciprabhṛtayaḥ
GR13saulahpu:15: yad ālokyautsukyād amaralalanā yānti manasā tapobhir duṣprāpām api giriśasāyujyapadavīm // naraṃ varṣīyāṃsaṃ nayanavirasaṃ narmasu jaḍaṃ tavāpāṅgāloke patitam anudhāvanti śataśaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:16_0: galadveṇībandhāḥ kucakalaśavisrastasicayā haṭhāt truṭyatkāñcyo vigalitadukūlā yuvatayaḥ // kṣitau ṣatpañcāśad dvisamadhikapañcāśad
GR13saulahpu:17: divi dviḥṣattriṃśan manasi ca catuḥṣaṣṭir iti ye mayūkhās teṣām apy upari tava pādāmbujayugam śarajjyotsnāśubhrāṃ śaśiyutajaṭājūṭamukuṭāṃ varatrāsatrāṇasphaṭikaguṭikāpustakakarām /
GR13saulahpu:18_0: sakṛn na tvā natvā katham iva stāṃ saṃnidadhate madhukṣīradrākṣāmadhurimadhurīṇā bhaṇitayaḥ kavīndrāṇāṃ cetaḥkamalavanabālātaparuciṃ
GR13saulahpu:18_1: bhajante ye santaḥ kati cid aruṇām eva bhavatīm /
GR13saulahpu:20: gabhīrābhir vāgbhir vidadhati satāṃ rañjanam amī // Saul_16 //
GR13saulahpu:21: savitrībhir vācāṃ śaśimaṇiśilābhaṅgarucibhir vaśinyādyābhis tvāṃ saha janani saṃcintayati yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:22_0: sa kartā kāvyānāṃ bhavati mahatāṃ bhaṅgisubhagair vacobhir vāgdevīvadanakamalāmodamadhuraiḥ tanucchāyābhis te taruṇataraṇiśrīsaraṇibhir
GR13saulahpu:22_1: divaṃ sarvām urvīm aruṇimanigmagnāṃ smarati yaḥ
GR13saulahpu:23_0: bhavanty asya trasyadvanahariṇaśālīnanayanāḥ sahorvaśyā vaśyāḥ katikati na gīrvāṇagaṇikā // mukhaṃ binduṃ kṛtvā kucayugam
GR13saulahpu:23_1: adhas tasya tadadho harārdhaṃ dhyāyed yo haramahiṣi te manmathakalām
GR13saulahpu:24_0: sa sadyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ nayati vanitā ity atilaghu trilokīm apy āśu bhramayati ravīndustanayugām kirantīm aṅgebhyaḥ kiraṇanikurambāmṛtarasaṃ
GR13saulahpu:24_1: hṛdi tvām ādhatte himakaraśilāmūrtim iva yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:25_0: sa sarpāṇāṃ darpaṃ śamayati śakuntādhipa iva jvarapluṣṭān dṛṣṭyā sukhayati sudhādhārasirayā taḍillekhātanvīṃ tapanaśaśivaiśvānaramayīṃ
GR13saulahpu:25_1: niṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇām apy upari kamalānāṃ tava kalām
GR13saulahpu:26: mahāpadmāṭavyāṃ mṛditamalamāyena manasā mahāntaḥ paśyanto dadhati paramāhlādalaharīm // Saul_21
GR13saulahpu:27: bhavāni tvaṃ dāse mayi vitara dṛṣṭiṃ sakaruṇāṃ iti stotuṃ vāñchan kathayati bhavāni tvam iti yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:28_0: tadaiva tvaṃ tasmai diśasi nijasāyujyapadavīṃ mukundabrahmendrasphuṭamukuṭanīrājitapadām // tvayā hṛtvā vāmaṃ vapur aparitṛptena
GR13saulahpu:28_1: manasā śarīrārdhaṃ śaṃbhor aparam api śaṅke hṛtam abhūt
GR13saulahpu:29_0: tathā hi tvadrūpaṃ sakalam aruṇābhaṃ trinayanaṃ kucābhyām ānamraṃ kuṭilaśaśicūḍālamukuṭam jagat sūte dhātā harir avati rudraḥ
GR13saulahpu:29_1: kṣapayate tiras kurvann etat svam api vapur īśas tirayati
GR13saulahpu:30_0: sadāpūrvaḥ sarvaṃ tad idam anugṛhṇāti ca śivas tavājñām ālambya kṣanacalitayor bhrūlatikayoḥ trayāṇāṃ devānāṃ triguṇajanitānāṃ
GR13saulahpu:30_1: tava śive bhavet pūjā pūjā tava caraṇayor yā viracitā /
GR13saulahpu:31_0: tathā hi tvatpādodvahanamaṇipīṭhasya nikaṭe sthitā hy ete śaśvan mukulitakarottaṃsamukuṭāḥ virañciḥ pañcatvaṃ vrajati harir
GR13saulahpu:31_1: āpnoti viratiṃ vināśaṃ kīnāśo bhajati dhanado yāti nidhanam
GR13saulahpu:32_0: vitandrī māhendrī vitatir api saṃmīlitadṛśā mahāsaṃhāre +asmin viharati sati tvatpatir asau japo jalpaḥ śilpaṃ sakalam api
GR13saulahpu:33_0: praṇāmaḥ saṃveśaḥ sukham akhilam ātmārpaṇadṛśā saparyāparyāyas tava bhavatu yan me vilasitam dadāne dīnebhyaḥ śriyam aniśam
GR13saulahpu:34: tavāsmin mandārastabakasubhage yātu caraṇe nimajjan majjīvaḥ karaṇacaraṇaiḥ ṣa.ccaraṇatām sudhām apy āsvādya pratibhayajarāmṛtyuhariṇīṃ vipadyante viśve vidhiśatamakhādyā diviṣadaḥ
GR13saulahpu:35_0: karālaṃ yat kṣveḍaṃ kavalitavataḥ kālakalanā na śaṃbhos tanmūlaṃ tava janani tāṭaṅkamahimā kirīṭaṃ vairiñcaṃ parihara puraḥ
GR13saulahpu:35_1: kaiṭabhabhidaḥ kaṭhore koṭīre skhalasi jahi jambhārimukuṭam
GR13saulahpu:36_0: praṇamreṣv eteṣu prasabham abhiyātasya bhavanaṃ bhavasyābhyutthāne tava parijanoktir vijayate catuḥṣaṣṭyā tantraiḥ sakalam
GR13saulahpu:38: svatantraṃ te tantraṃ kṣititalam avātītarad idam // Saul_31 //
GR13saulahpu:39: śivaḥ śaktiḥ kāmaḥ kṣitir atha raviḥ śītakiraṇaḥ smaro haṃsaḥ śakras tad anu ca parāmāraharayaḥ
GR13saulahpu:40_0: amī hṛllekhābhis tisṛbhir avasāneṣu ghaṭitā bhajante varṇās te tava janani nāmāvayavatām // smaraṃ yoniṃ lakṣmīṃ tritayam
GR13saulahpu:40_1: idam ādau tava manor nidhāyaike nitye niravadhimahābhogarasikāḥ
GR13saulahpu:41_0: japanti tvāṃ cintāmaṇigunanibaddhākṣavalayāḥ śivāgnau juhvantaḥ surabhighṛtadhārāhutiśataiḥ śarīraṃ tvaṃ śaṃbhoḥ śaśimihiravakṣoruhayugaṃ
GR13saulahpu:42_0: ataḥ śeṣaḥ śeṣīty ayam ubhayasādhāraṇatayā sthitaḥ saṃbandho vāṃ samarasaparānandaparayoḥ manas tvaṃ vyoma tvaṃ marud asi
GR13saulahpu:42_1: marutsārathir asi tvam āpas tvaṃ bhūmis tvayi pariṇatāyāṃ na hi param /
GR13saulahpu:43: tvam eva svātmānaṃ pariṇamayituṃ viśvavapuṣā cidānandākāraṃ śivayuvati bhāvena bibhṛṣe // tavājñācakrasthaṃ tapanaśaśikoṭidyutidharam paraṃ śaṃbhuṃ vande parimilitapārśvaṃ paracitā
GR13saulahpu:44: yam ārādhyan bhaktyā raviśaśiśucīnām aviṣaye nirāloke loko nivasati hi bhālokabhavane // Saul_36
GR13saulahpu:45: viśuddhau te śuddhasphaṭikaviśadaṃ vyomajanakaṃ śivaṃ seve devīm api śivasamānavyasaninīm
GR13saulahpu:46_0: yayoḥ kāntyā yāntyā śaśikiraṇasārūpyasaraṇiṃ vidhūtāntardhvāntā vilasati cakorīva jagatī // samunmīlatsaṃvitkamalamakarandaikarasikaṃ
GR13saulahpu:46_1: bhaje haṃsadvaṃdvaṃ kim api mahatāṃ mānasacaram
GR13saulahpu:47_0: yadālāpād aṣṭādaśaguṇitavidyāpariṇatir yad ādatte doṣād guṇam akhilam adbhyaḥ paya iva // tava svādhiṣṭhāne hutavaham adhiṣṭhāya
GR13saulahpu:47_1: nirataṃ tam īḍe saṃvartaṃ janani mahatīṃ tāṃ ca samayām
GR13saulahpu:48_0: yadāloke lokān dahati mahati krodhakalile dayārdrā dṛṣṭis te śiśiram upacāraṃ racayati // taḍitvantaṃ śaktyā timiraparipanthisphuraṇayā
GR13saulahpu:49: tava śyāmaṃ meghaṃ kam api maṇipūraikaśaraṇaṃ niṣeve varṣantaṃ haramihirataptaṃ tribhuvanam tavādhāre mūle saha samayayā lāsyaparayā navātmānaṃ vande navarasamahātāṇḍavanaṭam /
GR13saulahpu:50_0: ubhābhyām etābhyām ubhayavidhim uddiśya dayayā sanāthābhyāṃ jajñe janakajananīmad jagad idam gatair māṇikyatvaṃ gaganamaṇibhiḥ
GR13saulahpu:50_1: sāndraghaṭitaṃ kirīṭaṃ te haimaṃ himagirisute kīrtayati yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:51_0: sa nīḍeyacchāyācchuraṇaśabalaṃ candraśakalaṃ dhanuḥ śaunāsīraṃ kim iti na nibadhnāti dhiṣaṇām dhunotu dhvāntaṃ nas tulitadalitendīvaravanaṃ
GR13saulahpu:52: yadīyaṃ saurabhyaṃ sahajam upalabdhuṃ sumanaso vasanty asmin manye balamathanavāṭīviṭapinām vahantī sundūraṃ prabalakabarībhāratimira-
GR13saulahpu:56: arālaiḥ svābhāvyād alikalabhasaśrībhir alakaiḥ parītaṃ te vaktraṃ parihasati paṅkeruharucim
GR13saulahpu:57: darasmere yasmin daśanarucikiñjalkarucire sugandhau mādyanti smaramathanacakṣurmadhulihaḥ lalāṭaṃ lāvaṇyadyutivimalam ābhāti tava yad dvitīyaṃ tan manye mukuṭaśaśikhaṇḍasya śakalam
GR13saulahpu:58_0: viparyāsanyāsād ubhayam api saṃbhūya ca mithaḥ sudhālepasyūtiḥ pariṇamati rākāhimakaraḥ // bhruvau bhugne kiṃcid bhuvanabhayabhaṅgavyasanini
GR13saulahpu:59_0: dhanur manye savyetarakaragṛhītaṃ ratipateḥ prakoṣṭhe muṣṭau ca sthagayati nigūḍhāntaram ume ahaḥ sūte savyaṃ tava nayanam
GR13saulahpu:59_1: arkātmakatayā triyāmāṃ vāmaṃ te sṛjati rajanīnāyakamayam /
GR13saulahpu:60_0: tṛtīyā te dṛṣtir daradalitahemāmbujaruciḥ samādhatte saṃdhyāṃ divasaniśayor antaracarīm // viśālā kalyāṇī sphuṭarucir ayodhyā
GR13saulahpu:60_1: kuvalayaiḥ kṛpādhārādhārā kim api madhurā bhogavatikā /
GR13saulahpu:61: avantī dṛṣṭis te bahunagaravistāravijayā dhruvaṃ tattannāmavyavaharaṇayogyā vijayate // Saul_49
GR13saulahpu:63: amuñcantau dṛṣṭvā tava nvarasāsvādataralāv asūyāsaṃsargād alikanayanaṃ kiṃcid aruṇam // Saul_50
GR13saulahpu:64: śive śṛṅgārārdrā taditaramukhe kutsanaparā saroṣā gaṅgāyāṃ giriśacarite vismayavatī /
GR13saulahpu:65_0: harāhibhyo bhītā sarasiruhasaubhāgyajayinī sakhīṣu smerā te mayi janani dṛṣṭiḥ sakaruṇā // gate karṇābhyarṇaṃ garuta iva
GR13saulahpu:66: ime netre gotrādharapatikulottaṃsakalike tavākarṇākṛṣṭasmaraśaravilāsaṃ kalayataḥ // Saul_52
GR13saulahpu:67: vibhaktatraivarṇyaṃ vyatikaritanīlāñjanatayā vibhāti tvannetratritayam idam īśānadayite /
GR13saulahpu:68: punaḥ sraṣṭuṃ devān druhiṇaharirudrān uparatān rajaḥ sattvaṃ bibhrat tama iti guṇānāṃ trayam iva // Saul_53 //
GR13saulahpu:69: pavitrīkartuṃ naḥ paśupatiparādhīnahṛdaye dayāmitrair netrair aruṇadhavalaśyāmarucibhiḥ /
GR13saulahpu:70: nadaḥ śoṇo gaṅgā tapanatanayeti dhruvam amuṃ trayāṇāṃ tīrthānām upanayasi saṃbhedam anaghe tavāparṇe karṇejapanayanapaiśunyacakitā nilīyante toye niyatam animeṣāḥ śapharikāḥ /
GR13saulahpu:71_0: iyaṃ ca śrīr baddhacchadapuṭakapāṭaṃ kuvalayam jahāti pratyūṣe niśi ca vighaṭayya praviśati nimeṣonmeṣābhyāṃ pralayam udayaṃ
GR13saulahpu:71_1: yāti jagatī tavety āhuḥ santo dharaṇidhararājanyatanaye /
GR13saulahpu:72: tvadunmeṣāj jātaṃ jagad idam aśeṣaṃ pralayataḥ paritrātuṃ śaṅke parihṛtanimeṣās tava dṛśaḥ dṛśā drāghīyasyā daradalitanīlotpalarucā davīyāṃsaṃ dīnaṃ snapaya kṛpayā mām api śive /
GR13saulahpu:73: anenāyaṃ dhanyo bhavati na ca te hānir iyatā vane vā harmye vā samakaranipāto himakaraḥ // arālaṃ te pālīyugalam agarājanyatanaye na keṣām ādhatte kusumaśarakodaṇḍakutukam /
GR13saulahpu:74_0: tiraścīno yatra śravaṇapatham ullaṅghya vilasan apāṅgavyāsaṅgo diśati śarasaṃdhānadhiṣaṇām sphuradgaṇḍābhogapratiphalitatāṭaṅkayugalaṃ
GR13saulahpu:74_1: catuścakraṃ manye tava mukham idaṃ manmatharatham
GR13saulahpu:75_0: yam āruhya druhyaty avaniratham arkenducaraṇaṃ mahāvīro māraḥ pramathapataye svaṃ jitavate sarasvatyāḥ sūktīr amṛtalaharīkauśalaharīḥ
GR13saulahpu:76_0: camatkāraślāghācalitaśirasaḥ kuṇḍalagaṇo jhaṇatkārais tāraiḥ prativacanam ācaṣṭae iva te // asau nāsāvaṃśas tuhinagirivaṃśadhvajapaṭi
GR13saulahpu:76_1: tvadīyo nedīyaḥ phalatu phalam asmākam ucitam /
GR13saulahpu:77_0: vahann antar muktāḥ śiśirataraniśvāsaghaṭitāḥ samṛddhyā yas tāsāṃ bahir api ca muktāmaṇidharaḥ prakṛtyā raktāyās tava sudati
GR13saulahpu:77_1: dantacchadaruceḥ pravakṣye sādṛśyaṃ janayatu phalaṃ vidrumalatā
GR13saulahpu:78: na bimbaṃ tadbimbapratiphalanalābhād aruṇitaṃ tulām adhyāroḍhuṃ katham iva vilajjeta kalayā smitajyotsnājālaṃ tava vadanacandrasya pibatāṃ cakorāṇām āsīd atirasatayā cañcujaḍimā /
GR13saulahpu:79: atas te śītāṃśor amṛtalaharīm amlarucayaḥ pibanti svacchandaṃ niśiniśi bhṛśaṃ kāñcikadhiyā aviśrāntaṃ patyur guṇagaṇakathāmreḍanajapā japāpuṣpacchāyā tava janani jihvā jayati sā /
GR13saulahpu:80_0: yadagrāsīnāyāḥ sphaṭikadṛṣadacchacchavimayī sarasvatyā mūrtiḥ pariṇamati māṇikyavapuṣā // raṇe jitvā daityān apahṛtaśirastraiḥ
GR13saulahpu:81: viśākhendropendraiḥ śaśiviśadakarpūraśakalā vilīyante mātas tava vadanatāmbūlakabalāḥ // Saul_65
GR13saulahpu:82: vipañcyā gāyantī vividham avadānaṃ paśupates tvayārabdhe vaktuṃ calitaśirasā sādhuvacane /
GR13saulahpu:83: tvadīyair mādhuryair apalapitatantrīkalaravāṃ nijāṃ vīṇāṃ vāṇī niculayati colena nibhṛtam karāgreṇa spaṣṭaṃ tuhinagiriṇā vatsalatayā girīśenodastaṃ muhur adharapānākulatayā /
GR13saulahpu:84_0: karagrāhyaṃ śaṃbhor mukhamukuravṛntaṃ girisute kathaṃkāraṃ brūmas tava cibukam aupamyarahitam bhujāśleṣān nityaṃ puradamayituḥ
GR13saulahpu:84_1: kaṇṭakavatī tava grīvā dhatte mukhakamalanālaśriyam iyam
GR13saulahpu:85: svataḥ śvetā kālāgarubahalajambālamalinā mṛṇālīlālityam vahati yadadho hāralatikā // Saul_68
GR13saulahpu:87: virājante nānāvidhamadhurarāgākarabhuvāṃ trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ sthitiniyamasīmāna iva te // Saul_69
GR13saulahpu:88: mṛṇālīmṛdvīnāṃ tava bhujalatānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ caturbhiḥ saundaryaṃ sarasijabhavaḥ stauti vadanaiḥ
GR13saulahpu:89_0: nakhebhyaḥ saṃtrasyan prathamamathanād andhakaripoś caturṇāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ samam abhayahastārpaṇadhiyā nakhānām uddyotair navanalinarāgaṃ
GR13saulahpu:89_1: vihasatāṃ karāṇāṃ te kāntiṃ kathaya kathayāmaḥ katham ume
GR13saulahpu:90_0: kayā cid vā sāmyaṃ bhajatu kalayā hanta kamalaṃ yadi krīḍallakṣmīcaraṇatalalākṣāruṇadalam samaṃ devi skandadvipavadanapītaṃ
GR13saulahpu:90_1: stanayugaṃ tavedaṃ naḥ khedaṃ haratu satataṃ prasnutamukham
GR13saulahpu:91: yad ālokyāśaṅkākulitahṛdayo hāsajanakaḥ svakumbhau herambaḥ parimṛśati hastena jhaṭiti // amū te vakṣojāv amṛtarasamāṇikyakutupau na saṃdehaspando nagapatipatāke manasi naḥ /
GR13saulahpu:92_0: pibantau tau yasmād aviditavadhūsaṃgamarasau kumārāv adyāpi dviradavadanakrauñcadalanau // vahaty amba stamberamadanujakumbhaprakṛtibhiḥ
GR13saulahpu:93: kucābhogo bimbādhararucibhir antaḥ śabalitāṃ pratāpavyāmiśrāṃ puravijayinaḥ kīrtim iva te tava stanyaṃ manye dharaṇidharakanye hṛdayataḥ payaḥpārāvāraḥ parivahati sārasvata iva /
GR13saulahpu:94: dayāvatyā dattaṃ draviḍaśiśur āsvādya tava yat kavīnāṃ prauḍhānām ajani kamaniyaḥ kavayitā harakrodhajvālāvalibhir avalīḍhena vapuṣā gabhīre te nābhīsarasi kṛtasaṅgo manasijaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:95_0: samuttasthau tasmād acalatanaye dhūmalatikā janas tāṃ jānīte janani tava romāvalir iti // yad etat kālindītanutarataraṅgākṛti
GR13saulahpu:95_1: śive kṛśe madhye kiṃ cij janani tava tad bhāti sudhiyām
GR13saulahpu:96: vimardād anyoanyaṃ kucakalaśayor antaragataṃ tanūbhūtaṃ vyoma praviśad iva nābhīkuhariṇīm sthiro gaṅgāvartaḥ stanamukularomāvalilatā-
GR13saulahpu:98_0: rater līlāgāraṃ kim api tava nābhīti girije biladvāraṃ siddher giriśanayanānāṃ vijayate // nisargakṣīṇasya stanataṭabhareṇa
GR13saulahpu:98_1: klamajuṣo namanmūrter nābhau baliṣu śanakais truṭyatae iva
GR13saulahpu:99_0: ciraṃ te madhyasya truṭitataṭinītīrataruṇā samāvasthāsthemno bhavatu kuśalaṃ śailatanaye // kucau sadyaḥ svidyattaṭaghaṭitakūrpāsabhidurau
GR13saulahpu:100: tava trātuṃ bhaṅgād alam iti vilagnaṃ tanubhuvā tridhā naddhaṃ devi trivali lavalīvallibhir iva // Saul_80 //
GR13saulahpu:101: gurutvaṃ vistāraṃ kṣitidharapatiḥ pārvati nijān nitambād ācchidya tvayi haraṇarūpeṇa nidadhe
GR13saulahpu:102: atas te vistīrṇo gurur ayam aśeṣāṃ vasumatīṃ nitambaprāgbhāraḥ sthagayati laghutvaṃ nayati ca // Saul_81 //
GR13saulahpu:103: karīndrāṇāṃ śuṇḍāḥ kanakakadalīkāṇḍapaṭalīm ubhābhyām ūrubhyām ubhayam api nirjitya bhavatī
GR13saulahpu:104: suvṛttābhyāṃ patyuḥ praṇatikaṭhinābhyāṃ girisute vijigye jānubhyāṃ vibudhakarikumbhadvayam api // Saul_82 //
GR13saulahpu:105: parājetuṃ rudraṃ dviguṇaśaragarbhau girisute niṣaṅgau jaṅghe te viṣamaviśikho bāḍham akṛta
GR13saulahpu:108: śrutīnāṃ mūrdhāno dadhati tava yau śekharatayā mamāpy etau mātaḥ śirasi dayayā dhehi caraṇau
GR13saulahpu:109: yayoḥ pādyaṃ pāthaḥ paśupatijaṭājūṭataṭinī yayor lākṣālakṣmīr aruṇaharicūḍāmaṇiruciḥ // Saul_84
GR13saulahpu:110: namovākaṃ brūmo nayanaramaṇīyāya padayos tavāsmai dvandvāya sphuṭarucirasālaktakavate /
GR13saulahpu:111: asūyaty atyantaṃ yad abhihananāya spṛhayate paśūnām īśānaḥ pramadavanakaṅkelitarave // Saul_85
GR13saulahpu:112: mṛṣā kṛtvā gotraskhalanam atha vailakṣyanamitaṃ lalāṭe bhartāraṃ caraṇakamale tāḍayati te
GR13saulahpu:113: cirād antaḥśalyaṃ dahanakṛtam unmūlitavatā tulākoṭikvāṇaiḥ kilikilitam īśānaripuṇā // Saul_86
GR13saulahpu:114: himānīhantavyaṃ himagiritaṭākrānticaturau niśāyāṃ nidrāṇāṃ niśi ca parabhāge ca viśadau /
GR13saulahpu:115: paraṃ lakṣmīpātraṃ śriyam atisṛjantau samayināṃ sarojaṃ tvatpādau janani jayataś citram iha kim // Saul_87 //
GR13saulahpu:116: padaṃ te kāntīnāṃ prapadam apadaṃ devi vipadāṃ kathaṃ nītaṃ sadbhiḥ kaṭhinakamaṭhīkarparatulām
GR13saulahpu:117: kathaṃ vā bāhubhyām upayamanakāle purabhidā yad ādāya nyastaṃ dṛṣadi dayamānena manasā // nakhair nākastrīṇāṃ karakamalasaṃkocaśaśibhis tarūṇāṃ divyānāṃ hasata iva te caṇḍi caraṇau
GR13saulahpu:118_0: phalāni svasthebhyaḥ kisalayakarāgreṇa dadatāṃ daridrebhyo bhadrāṃ śriyam aniśam ahnāya dadatau kadā kāle mātaḥ kathaya kalitālaktakarasaṃ
GR13saulahpu:119: prakṛtyā mūkānām api ca kavitākāraṇatayā yad ādhatte vāṇīmukhakamalatāmbūlarasatām // Saul_90
GR13saulahpu:120: padanyāsakrīḍāparicayam ivārabdhumanasaś carantas te khelaṃ bhavanakalahaṃsā na jahati /
GR13saulahpu:123: arālā keśeṣu prakṛtisaralā mandahasite śirīṣābhā citte dṛṣad iva kaṭhorā kucataṭe /
GR13saulahpu:124: bhṛśaṃ tanvī madhye pṛthur urasijārohaviṣaye jagat trātuṃ śaṃbhor jayati karuṇā kā cid aruṇā purārāter antaḥpuram asi tatas tvaccaraṇayoḥ saparyāmaryādā taralakaraṇānām asulabhā /
GR13saulahpu:125_0: tathā hy ete nītāḥ śatamakhamukhāḥ siddhim atulāṃ tava dvāropāntasthitibhir aṇimādyābhir amarāḥ gatās te mañcatvaṃ druhiṇaharirudreśvarabhṛtaḥ
GR13saulahpu:126_0: tvadīyānāṃ bhāsāṃ pratiphalanalābhāruṇatayā śarīrī śṛṅgāro rasa iva dṛśāṃ dogdhi kutukam // kalaṅkaḥ kastūrī rajanikarabimbaṃ
GR13saulahpu:127_0: atas tvadbhogena pratidinam idaṃ riktakuharaṃ vidhir bhūyobhūyo nibiḍayati nūnaṃ tava kṛte svadehodbhūtābhir ghṛṇibhir aṇimādyābhir
GR13saulahpu:127_1: abhito niṣevye nitye tvām aham iti sadā bhāvayati yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:128_0: kim āścaryaṃ tasya trinayansamṛddhiṃ tṛṇayato mahāsaṃvartāgnir viracayati nīrājanavidhim // kalatraṃ vaidhātraṃ katikati
GR13saulahpu:128_1: bhajante na kavayaḥ śriyo devyāḥ ko vā na bhavati patiḥ kair api dhanaiḥ /
GR13saulahpu:129: mahādevaṃ hitvā tava sati satīnām acarame kucābhyām āsaṅgaḥ kuravakataror apy asulabhaḥ // girām āhur devīṃ druhiṇagṛhiṇīm āgamavido hareḥ patnīṃ padmāṃ harasahacārīm adritanayām /
GR13saulahpu:130: turīyā kāpi tvaṃ duradhigamaniḥsīmamahimā mahāmāye viśvaṃ bhramayasi parabrahmamahiṣi // Saul_98
GR13saulahpu:131: sarasvatyā lakṣmyā vidhiharisapatno viharate rateḥ pātivratyaṃ śithilayati ramyeṇa vapuṣā
GR13saulahpu:132_0: ciraṃ jīvann eṣa kṣapitapaśupāśavyatikaraḥ parabrahmābhikhyaṃ rasayati rasaṃ tvadbhajanavān pradīpajvālābhir divasakaranīrājanavidhiḥ
GR13saulahpu:133: svakīyair ambhobhiḥ salilanidhisauhityakaraṇaṃ tvadīyābhir vāgbhis tava janani vācāṃ stutir iyam // Saul_100 //
GR13saulahpu:134: samānītaḥ padbhyāṃ maṇimukuratām ambaramaṇir bhayād antarbaddhastimitakiraṇaśreṇimasṛṇaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:135_0: dadhāti tvadvaktraṃ pratiphalitam aśrāntivikacaṃ nirātaṅkaṃ candrān nijahṛdayapaṅkeruham iva samudbhūtasthūlastanabharam
GR13saulahpu:135_1: uraś cāru hasitaṃ kaṭākṣe kandarpaḥ kusumitakadambadyutivapuḥ
GR13saulahpu:136: harasya tvadbhrāntiṃ manasi janayām āsa madano bhavatyā ye bhaktāḥ pariṇatir amīṣām iyam ume nidhe nityasmere niravadhiguṇe nītinipuṇe nirāghātajñāne niyamaparacittaikanilaye /
